properties.name: conductor.sweep-frequency.millis
properties.description: The frequency in milliseconds, at which the workflow sweeper should evaluate active workflows.

properties.name: conductor.workflow-repair-service.enabled
properties.description: Configuration to enable WorkflowRepairService, that tries to keep ExecutionDAO and QueueDAO in sync, based on the task or workflow state. This is disabled by default; To enable, the Queueing layer must implement QueueDAO.containsMessage method.

properties.name: conductor.system-task-workers.enabled
properties.description: Configuration to enable SystemTaskWorkerCoordinator, that polls and executes the asynchronous system tasks.

properties.name: conductor.app.isolated-system-task-enabled
properties.description: Used to enable/disable use of isolation groups for system task workers.

properties.name: conductor.app.isolatedSystemTaskPollIntervalSecs
properties.description: The time interval (in seconds) at which new isolated task queues will be polled and added to the system task queue repository.

properties.name: conductor.app.taskPendingTimeThresholdMins
properties.description: The time threshold (in minutes) beyond which a warning log will be emitted for a task if it stays in the same state for this duration.

properties.name: conductor.workflow-monitor.metadataRefreshInterval
properties.description: The interval (counter) after which the workflow monitor refreshes the metadata definitions from the datastore for reporting.

properties.name: conductor.workflow-monitor.statsFrequencySeconds
properties.description: The time (in seconds) at which the workflow monitor publishes metrics about the system.

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.type
properties.description: The type of payload storage to be used for externalizing large payloads.

properties.name: conductor.default-event-processor.enabled
properties.description: Enables the default event processor for handling events.

properties.name: conductor.event-queues.default.enabled
properties.description: Enable the use of the underlying queue implementation to provide queues for consuming events.
